creator_para: Welcome to this calculation application, this application is created, crafted, designed on the basis of solving basic Mathematical problems. The Creator, Designer, Programmer and Manager of this Application is Anjani Kumar Jha . The Idea to develop this application for the Mathematical issue resolvement is conveyed over by the Respected Pricilla Pradhan Miss. After the designing and other logical and development work the left whole credit goes to the Respected Pricilla Pradhan(The best ever Teacher, Motivator and my bestest Friend in the whole world).
